title: Auto sync turns itself on
content:
Hi all,

Most likely, this is not a pixel 3 related issue. Either way, maybe someone can help me here.
Starting a week or so, the auto sync settings in the Settings->Accounts is turning on automatically automatically after i manually turn it off. Does anyone knows what setting/app may be responsible for this?
Or, alternately, does anyone know a way for me to find the culprit? 

Thanks in advance!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
